user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Love the pigmentation, love how it lasts all day. Will purchase again!

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
This is so easy to apply and blend! The formula is nice and soft, I find that I barely have to touch my brush to the product in order to get some nice pigmentation. The effect is glowy rather than too sparkly, as the shimmer is finely milled. I have a medium/fair olive skintone and use this as a blush, but I'm sure it would be nice as a blush topper too. This is the perfect blush if I want something that pairs easily with any look!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Gorgeous glowy blush. Great buildable formula. I all of the colors now!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Great Blush for olive skin. I purchased this shade based on other reviews stating it was a good colour match for olive skin tones. The colour is not quite as orangy as the chart would indicate; more of a bronze imo. Great for my colouring. I deducted one point as it is rather loose when using a brush to apply so I feel will waste a lot of product that way.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: My only complaint is that they don't make more colors! I love this blush, I am medium skin tone and purchased Nevermore, it is so beautiful I love it! It gives a beautiful glow and it is very pigmented so use a light hand. I wish they had more colors that I could wear.

user_specs: ['Age 45-54', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Beautiful deep golden bronzer. Its shimmery so not for contouring. But perfect bronze goddess glow.

user_specs: ['Age 45-54', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Gorgeous! Flattering on many skin tones, long lastering. My fave blush.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Dark', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Extremely impressed by this blush/highlight. I put it on my cheeks and high points of my face! It’s soo smooth and on my darker skin tone it looks lovely

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Obsessed! If you like a lustrous blush with slight shimmer this is for you! I love that the colors are sheer and buildable and can also be used as a highlighter. I have this in both Lynx and Nevermore. I'm a medium skin tone and both of these shades look great! Lynx is a bronze shade with a hint of pink and Nevermore is a pinky and magenta pearl blush. Just perfection!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Dark', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: My absolute favorite Melt product! I have fire fury, lynx, and nevermore but sundown is my favorite. I wear it almost everyday. It’s so beautiful for everyday glow. The name of this shade is so perfect because it literally looks like sunset lighting on your face. This makes my deep skin sing!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Not a fan. Looks too cakey on the skin, brings out texture and you can only see if an EXTREME high light is on your face. I did notice flash back on this. Bummer cuz everything else from this brand is top notch!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I bought this to use as an inner corner eye highlight and the color is so unique! It looks blue/green and kind of frosty... I use it as a highlight on my cheeks too when I’m feeling colorful... the formula is so soft

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: love using this as a not glittery glowy highlight or blush topper. I feel like I am oozing lavender when I dust it all over. On simple makeup days I sweep it across my eyes and pop on a mascara. I always get many compliments on this shade.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Love this shade as a topper or alone as a glowy blush

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Please come out with more shades! I love blush lights so much, use some of them as blushes esp nevermore and Electra and then some like ghostlight for highlight on cheeks and inner corner of eyes, etc. They are beautiful and you can use a light hand or build them up.
